extendedInfo.description: Now you can do envelope budgeting on your Android device. The Mvelopes Android app is a free application from Mvelopes.com which allows you real-time access to your Mvelopes account. Unlike other personal finance apps, Mvelopes lets you view, update and manage your finances right from your Android device. You can enter expenses, view envelope balances, and assign transactions in real time. Everything you do automatically updates your Mvelopes.com account.To start using Mvelopes, sign up for an account on Mvelopes.com, add your online banking accounts, and set up your budget. You can then use Mvelopes while on the go to give you full access to all of your personal financial information in Mvelopes.com.KEY MVELOPES FEATURESâ¢ Complete, real-time synchronization with the Mvelopes web app.â¢ Access, add, or change financial data while on the go.â¢ Simultaneous access to account information by multiple users.â¢ Take pictures of receipts or other supporting documents and attach them to transactions for documentation purposes.â¢ Use location-based features to âcheck inâ to nearby locations, allowing Mvelopes to quickly show you the envelope balances and spending categories you typically use at that location.â¢ Envelope Funding - You can now fund envelopes from your Android device. Either select a saved fundingâ¢ BILL PAY feature included. Pay your bills directly from your Android device.â¢ Added the ability to login using your Facebook accountAPPLYING ENVELOPE BUDGETING PRINCIPLES ON THE GOâ¢ Access all of your envelope balances so you always know what you can spendâ¢ Review balances of your checking, savings, credit card, and other accountsâ¢ Access individual transaction detailsâ¢ Assign transactions to expense envelopes, including splitting transactionsSAVING TIMEâ¢ Mvelopes automatically downloads transactions from over 14,000 financial institutions, freeing you from hours of tedious bookkeeping so you can focus on managing your finances using the principles of envelope budgeting.SECURITYâ¢ Mvelopes is committed to your security. In the unlikely event you lose your device, not only are your credentials encrypted, but you can easily change your password at Mvelopes.com to block unwanted access to your account.LEARN MOREâ¢ You can learn more about envelope budgeting, Mvelopes, and the Mvelopes Android app at www.mvelopes.com

reviews.title: Best Tool for Budgeting
reviews.comment: Best tool for looking forward to plan your future spending; not just tracking history.  Great tool for Dave Ramsey followers!  Everyone I know that uses this has had an option of becoming a Lifetime member after a few years so you never have to pay the monthly fee again.
reviews.author: Steve Boss

reviews.title: The Best
reviews.comment: I used Money Matters software for years. Mvelopes is the best online software available. You won\'t be disappointed. Take control of your finances.
reviews.author: DAVID GRAY

reviews.title: Getting better!
reviews.comment: Been awhile since I used mvelopes, online or on the phone. After 6 months with Quicken I am glad to say I am back with mvelopes. Envelope budgeting is still the best way to manage your finances and mvelopes is one of the best at it. Would give 5 stars if they improve the speed of entering new transactions and allow for offline usage.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok but needs improvement (Galaxy S3)
reviews.comment: 1) Desperately needs widget for quick entry. 2) Need better UI. 3) Need ability to add transaction from Envelopes tab (too many keystrokes to add expense). 4) Envelopes tab should show amount funded/balance remaining with day ticker.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I have been using mvelopes for 4years.
reviews.comment: It is awesome. I never overspend or have to use overdraft protection, and I have not written a bad check once. Not even by mistake.
reviews.author: Chris Rivenbark

reviews.title: Love the desktop version better
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using mvelopes for about a year now. The app still has a long way to go. There is no sync now button, so you are not always working with the most up to date information. This had caused duplicate and missed entries. I\'ve had a few issues with it freezing up, but a restart had taken care of that.
reviews.author: Amy Delaney

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Still getting used to the ui. Trends to eat my battery sometimes when I haven\'t used it. I\'ll pull up my battery info and mvelopes is using 40%!
reviews.author: Joe Fishel

reviews.title: Great System & App
reviews.comment: Great app. Can due almost everything from my Android. My only complaint with it is transactions don\'t immediately clear the new transaction list once you assign an envelope. The free version of the system is great and covers my needs for now. May have to upgrade later for more accounts & envelopes.
reviews.author: Brandon Atkins

reviews.title: Wonderful!
reviews.comment: Finally a financial software that I can use anywhere and especially on my phone!
reviews.author: Curtis McLaws

reviews.title: Brilliance
reviews.comment: Mvelopes helped me gain financial freedom from debt. It\'s so simple and intuitive even I could get it right! Choose Mvelopes for your budgeting software and you won\'t go wrong!
reviews.author: Andrew Mizen

reviews.title: Awesome App!
reviews.comment: We\'ve sed MVelopes for years now. And it works so well, we just don\'t have money issues.This app is a great tool! I use it daily.
reviews.author: David Davault

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: This is a pretty good app. You can do almost everything that you can do on the desktop version and if has some mobile specific features like check-ins and photos. I still have to go to t the computer some times to fix mistakes I make in the app or for a more involved planning session.
reviews.author: Jeremy Cox

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This app is an amazing tool to track your finances and empower you to make informed decisions about your finances. We found it super easy to use!
reviews.author: Dan Briggs

reviews.title: Finally works on tablet and phone
reviews.comment: Love mvelopes.  Best budget tool for true envelope budgeting.  Better than Mint if you really want to save in advance for purchases.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: I have used website for years to manage our money but having app means I have even more control over spending because I can check budget as I purchase.
reviews.author: paulette rodriguez

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Can\'t implement a sucessful budget without it.
reviews.author: Nikole Neal

reviews.comment: Excellent tool! Makes budgeting easy and fun.
reviews.author: Tracy Chappell

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: It\'s a great application.
reviews.author: Allen Lester Sandiego

reviews.title: Gives you control
reviews.comment: If you invest some time to your budget, this app gives you great insights into how you spend money.  The graphing capabilities, while they could be improved, give you a view of how your spending changes over time.  One downside is the lag time between expenses showing up in the tool.  Nice app though, my wife and I use it regularly to manage our budget together.
reviews.author: Jared Gosnell

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: Works pretty good for basic budgeting, but it can be a bit frustrating at times. I sometimes cannot get the site to work. There is also a major problem when you have to adjust your planned income. Sometimes you have to work around the quirks, but once you get used to it the app is good.
reviews.author: Mike Mills
